name: RemovePullRequestReviewers
description:
Remove requested reviewers from a GitHub pull request.

Use this tool to remove specific requested reviewers from a pull request on GitHub. This is helpful when you need to update the list of reviewers on an active pull request.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is case-insensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository from which to remove reviewers. It is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: pull_request_number
parameters.description: The unique identifier number for the pull request you want to modify.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the pull request.

parameters.name: user_logins_to_remove
parameters.description: An array of user logins to be removed from the pull request as reviewers.

value_schema.description: An array of user `login`s that will be removed.

parameters.name: team_slugs_to_remove
parameters.description: An array of team slugs that should be removed as reviewers from the pull request. Each slug corresponds to a team associated with the repository.

value_schema.description: An array of team `slug`s that will be removed.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: pull_number
parameters.description: The number that identifies the pull request.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the pull request.

parameters.name: reviewers
parameters.description: An array of user `login`s that will be removed.

value_schema.description: An array of user `login`s that will be removed.

parameters.name: team_reviewers
parameters.description: An array of team `slug`s that will be removed.

value_schema.description: An array of team `slug`s that will be removed.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
